onAccept(ActionEvent) - Method in class andrei.Controller.EditController
If the user accepts the edit, creation, the field information will be extracted with reflection, an object will be created with the required fields and then passed onto the database for further processing.

onEdit() - Method in class andrei.Controller.TableController
The edit view will be loaded with the option of editing an object: text fields and id will be filled with the corresponding data.
